vcmi.name: VCMI essential files
vcmi.description: Essential files required for VCMI to run correctly
vcmi.author: VCMI Team

Korean TrueType Fonts.name: Korean True type fonts
Korean TrueType Fonts.description: Mod that replaces original bitmap fonts with similar Korean true type fonts
Korean TrueType Fonts.author: hwiorn

ai trace.name: Adventure AI trace
ai trace.description: Configures console log for extensive adventure AI debug info
ai trace.author: Warmonger

axolotl creatures pack.name: Axolotl Creatures Pack
axolotl creatures pack.description: Axolotl creatures pack by Gilu. Mods added new neutral units (14 creatures).
axolotl creatures pack.author: Mod: Gilu, Avatar; Graphics: Axolotl

ban-mod.name: Ban Things Mod
ban-mod.description: Ban all factions (creatures, heroes, towns) and creature banks form original game. Useful for testing.
ban-mod.author: N/A

chinese fonts.name: Chinese Fonts
chinese fonts.description: Mod that provides support for simplified Chinese version of Heroes III
chinese fonts.author: VCMI Team

hota.author: Hota Crew, ported by VCMI Team
hota.description: Work-in-progress port of Horn of the Abyss expansion for made by Hota Crew
hota.name: Horn of the Abyss

dark elemental.name: Dark elemental
dark elemental.description: made by Lord Hawk from def of metalpiss
dark elemental.author: Lord Hawk

h4 arts - commander.name: H4 artifacts - commanders
h4 arts - commander.description: Artifacts from Heroes of Might & Magic 4
h4 arts - commander.author: Graphics: Kuririn, mod : Warmonger

h4 arts - hero.name: H4 artifacts - regular
h4 arts - hero.description: Artifacts from Heroes of Might & Magic 4
h4 arts - hero.author: Graphics: Kuririn, mod : Warmonger

man at arms castle.name: Man at arms - Castle
man at arms castle.description: made by Lord Hawk from def of Alex-ander (Hota team)
man at arms castle.author: Lord Hawk

mountain dwarf.name: Mountain Dwarf
mountain dwarf.description: made by Lord Hawk from def of Alex-ander (Hota team)
mountain dwarf.author: Lord Hawk

new-menu.name: High-res Menu
new-menu.description: High resolution main menu pack created by Dru for VCMI
new-menu.author: Dru

new terrains.name: New Terrains (ERA II mod port)
new terrains.description: Changes the regular terrains outfit. Compatible with everything
new terrains.author: Etoprostoya aka Itsjustm

tarnum - pt1.name: Tarnum is back - pt1 (Original Factions)
tarnum - pt1.description: Playable Tarnum in all his previous incarnations (Knight, Ranger, Barbarian, Wizard, Beastmaster and Overlord) as well as 3 new ones (Death Knight, Demoniac and Planeswalker). Most of the graphics are exported from Heroes Chronicles, Heroes of Might and Magic 3 Complete or Horn of the Abyss. I'm the author of Planeswalker and Demoniac portraits and some speciality graphics, Hobbit is the author of Death Knight Tarnum (I received his permission to use this portrait). Mod gives each of original Heroes factions one Tarnum :)
tarnum - pt1.author: marif, Hobbit (Death Knight), HotA Team (Overlord speciality icons)

1.0.2: Changed Overlord Tarnum speciality icons to the ones used in HotA
Changes in abilities of Death Knight Tarnum (added basic Offence, reduced Necromancy to basic)
Fixed quantity of Beastmaster Tarnum's Serpent Flies
1.0.4: Updated mod file to VCMI version 0.96

tarnum - pt2.name: Tarnum is back - pt2 (Cove)
tarnum - pt2.description: This mod adds Tarnum as a playable hero for Cove (Captain). In order to play, Cove town mod must be installed!
tarnum - pt2.author: marif

1.0.1: Changed Tarnum's abilities (reduced Navigation to basic, added basic Offence)
1.0.4: Updated mod file to VCMI version 0.96
Changed/fixes compatibility to HotA mod (now requires HotA and COVE submod installed to work). Will not work with older versions.

truetypefonts.name: True type fonts
truetypefonts.description: Mod that replaces original bitmap fonts with similar true type fonts
truetypefonts.author: Ivan

witchking-arts.name: Witchking artifacts
witchking-arts.description: First new artifact pack proposed by Withcking
witchking-arts.author: Witchking

wog.name: In The Wake of Gods
wog.description: Unnofficial addon for Heroes of Might and Magic III
wog.author: WoG Team

wog rus.name: WoG russian translation
